game_description: Have you ever used a slingshot to hit something? Then, this game is for you . Sling VR is the first and best Slingshot game made for Oculus . Sling VR has prefect physics and pleasant graphics. You can hit fruits and coconuts. You can break pots and hunt birds. Some monkeys on the beach will try to hit you with coconuts. Once purchased, Sling VR will get free updates and free new modes. Gamers are requested to suggest new ideas to improve gameplay. Enjoy!!
review_1: Just a good relaxing game. Nice Graphics
